original_text: He also built a structure against the wall of the house, running around the walls of the house, both the nave and the inner sanctuary. And he made side chambers all around.
korean_text: 또 성전의 벽 곧 성소와 지성소의 벽에 연접하여 돌아가며 다락들을 건축하되 다락마다 돌아가며 골방들을 만들었으니

sentences.original_text: He also built a structure against the wall of the house,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 성전 벽에 구조물을 지었는데,

sentences.original_text: running around the walls of the house,
both the nave and the inner sanctuary.
And he made side chambers all around.
